TopicTitle: How to build better suspension WITH OUT MODS!!!!!

Articles.Content: I like my unexplained random links to be a bit more explained.

I suppose I might have been a little more impressed by the the idea (which otherwise looks good) if as soon as the demo rover had left the comfort of smooth tarmac it hadn't fallen to bits and exploded.

I suppose I might have been a little more impressed by the the idea (which otherwise looks good) if as soon as the demo rover had left the comfort of smooth tarmac it hadn't fallen to bits and exploded.

That too.

P.S. Kerbal Foundries wheels are the best, hands down.

here you go: http://www.file-upload.net/download-10194887/stock-rover.craft.html

does behave quite well, just drive from docking control and activate SAS
